description: Part demolition of existing buildings in a conservation area  part redevelopment  part retention and refurbishment of former brewery site to provide: offices - 56 311 sqm; workshop/studios - 8 330 sqm; pub/wine bar /restaurant - 1 301 sqm; day nursery - 375 sqm; gallery - 285 sqm; community meeting room - 150 sqm; within new buildings rising to 9 storeys above ground level and refurbishment buildings including the Cannon Brewery building at 156 St John Street and the former bonded warehouse on Berry Street; alterations to Compton Passage  new pedestrian areas  parking and servicing. PROPOSED PLANS: 0.001C 010-012 020; A.001E 002E 003D 004E; CH.001B 002B; CS.001C 002A; B.001B-003B; CAN.001 002; J.001E 002E 003G-005G 006F-012F 020G 021F-023F 030E 031E; P.001B; D.001. THIS IS A DIFFERENT SCHEME FROM APPLICATION 89/1714.
decision_conditions: APPLICANTS HAVE APPEALED AGAINST NON DETERMINATION 02.11.90. APPEAL DISMISSED 30.10.91.
